info.description:
(During first 3 volumes at some point, flexible canon for convenience.)

Weiss Schnee shared a room with three of the sexiest girls in Beacon. She would love to have even one of them fuck her, but who knows how they'll respond to that? Luckily she has a solution.

Her Glyphs. While training she found out how to make a glyph that will put anyone into a hypnotic trance. She immediately starts planing on how to turn her team and every other sexy girl in the school into her sex slaves.

Rules:
1) Good grammer. I'll allow you some typos but if a chapter is incomprehensable, I'll delete it.
2) I can add rules later if I think of any more.

Have Fun
